channel.title: Introduce Yourself!
channel.description:
Hey guys! So I thought it'd be cool to get to know each other a little more, so here's a place where we can introduce ourselves to other Auxy members.
My name is Andrew Adams, and I'm an 18 year old from Iowa. I love making upbeat exciting EDM tunes in Auxy, and hope to make some Christian vocal songs in the future. Here's the link to my SoundCloud profile: https://soundcloud.com/user-andrewadams
Besides Auxy I enjoy soccer, running, chess, writing, and piano.
What about the rest of you? :)

item.title: Introduce Yourself!
item.dc:creator: Xeus
item.description:
Hi, i‚Äôm Xeus. Despite being new to this place I‚Äôve been using Auxy since say November. It‚Äôs a pretty cool app and I‚Äôve decided to make a soundcloud to post some songs. I‚Äôll link it when i can be bothered i‚Äôm tired at the moment haha. Anyway be kind and hopefully I can make some friends.
-X
That‚Äôs not a kiss it‚Äôs my initial

item.title: Introduce Yourself!
item.dc:creator: Isometric
item.description:
Hi I‚Äôm Isometric. I play the guitar and make covers(like Cole Rolland ). I‚Äôm doing my final year in high school. I‚Äôve been using Auxy for about 2 years now. Probably the best software I‚Äôve used on iOS . Music is my passion and hobby.
This is a great community. And I‚Äôm hoping to get to know all of you.

Cheers

Read full topic

item.title: Introduce Yourself!
item.dc:creator: PietervBoven
item.description:
Hi! I‚Äôm Pieter (Like Peter but with an extra -i) I‚Äôm an Auxy artist from The Netherlands (Rotterdam) who just realeased my new album ‚ÄúEvolved‚Äù. I have used auxy for a while now and really like how it makes it easy to work on tracks wherever you are. My album features 12 tracks. I have a taste in music that can be best discribed as ‚ÄúSpace house‚Äù. Check it out:

https://soundcloud.com/ietervanoven/sets/evolved

Don‚Äôt forget to follow me!

Pieter van Boven

Read full topic

item.title: Introduce Yourself!
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
There‚Äôs a brand new 2018 thread, to share some information about yourself and list your social media details‚Ä¶

2018 - Auxy Forum Members Random
You can Introduce yourself and list your social media details using the template below. This thread will focus on posting the details below only. Any general chatty posts, comments or questions will be trashed. This replaces the earlier thread, which was a bit outdated. [download] Name (or producer name): Other / Historical Names: None. Country of residence: xxxxxxxxx Age (optional): Gender (optional): Currently available for collaboration requests? YES / NO. Currently availabl‚Ä¶

Read full topic

item.title: Introduce Yourself!
item.dc:creator: NickElle
item.description:
Hey, all, my name is Nick Lecroix.
I am a producer/DJ, audio engineer, lighting designer, and graphic designer.
I make mostly House* and Techno (*Deep House and Tech House)
I‚Äôve been doing this for 5+ years, and still going strong‚Ä¶ Stronger than ever, actually.

Also, since I‚Äôm an audio engineer, if anyone has any questions about mixing and mastering, I‚Äôll be happy to help.

And, here are some of my links:
http://www.praxismusic.net
http://soundcloud.com/lecroix-sib
https://soundcloud.com/praxismusicrecs

Read full topic

item.title: Introduce Yourself!
item.dc:creator: BALLISTIK
item.description:
Hi, I‚Äôm Cole, aka Ballistik, and I‚Äôm the one that responds to 3-week-old threads, and then realizes they were that old 3 weeks later‚Ä¶
I‚Äôm a music producer who lives in Georgia (before anyone asks: the state, not the country )
I love makin‚Äô fiery mixtapes with my computer and Logic Pro X and my Behringer X-Touch and my Yamaha YPG-235‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶and Auxy.
I love Jesus, music, fast cars, racing games, designing machines, rock climbing, jumping on my trampoline, and singing made up songs in the shower.
Best wishes,
(don‚Äôt judge)
-Cole

Read full topic
